summary: After a top gangster is murdered, his second-in-command must prevent an uprising by rival gangs.
cast: Shawn Yue|Elanne Kong|Chapman To|Conroy Chi-Chung Chan|Ada Choi|Renee Dai|Hark-On Fung|Ron Heung|Ella Koon|Jun Kung|Bruce Law|Anson Leung|Yuen-Leung Poon|Austin Wai|Goon Chung Wong|Parkman Wong|Tommy Yuen
title: Tung moon
